mapper.select: select o.num, o.order_number, o.order_cost, o.member_number, o.book_id, o.order_status, o.book_qty, m.member_id, b.book_title, b.book_price, o.order_phone, o.order_name, o.order_address, m.member_name, m.member_phone from ezenbooks b, ezenmembers m, ezenorders o where o.member_number = m.member_number and o.book_id=b.book_id order by o.num

select o.num, o.order_number, o.order_cost, o.member_number, o.book_id, o.order_status, o.book_qty, m.member_id, b.book_title, b.book_price, o.order_phone, o.order_name, o.order_address, m.member_name, b.book_img from ezenbooks b, ezenmembers m, ezenorders o where o.member_number = m.member_number and o.book_id=b.book_id and o.member_number=#{member_number} order by o.num

SELECT o.num, b.num, b.book_title, b.book_publisher,b.book_author, b.book_price,b.book_content,b.book_img, b.book_isbn, o.order_number, o.order_cost, o.member_number, o.book_id, o.order_status, o.book_qty FROM ezenorders o, ezenbooks b, ezenmembers m WHERE o.book_id = b.book_id AND o.num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into ezenorders (num, order_number, order_cost, member_number, book_id, order_status, order_phone, order_name, order_address, book_qty) values(ezenorders_num_seq.nextval, #{order_number}, #{order_cost}, #{member_number}, #{book_id}, 1, #{order_phone}, #{order_name}, #{order_address}, #{book_qty})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_status, o.order_number, o.order_name, o.order_phone, o.order_address, o.order_phone, m.member_name, m.member_phone, b.book_title, o.num, o.book_qty FROM ezenorders o, ezenbooks b, ezenmembers m WHERE m.member_number = o.member_number AND o.book_id = b.book_id AND o.num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE ezenorders SET order_status=0 WHERE order_number=#{order_number}
